name: Charlie Tango Romeo AI, LLC
description: Deverloper of talent and product hunt services platform intended to help startups grow and expand and also recruit talent. The company's platform operates as a matchmaking site for startups, talents, and investors, facilitating early-stage technology funding deals and early and later-stage funding to startups, enabling startups to access funds and investors and recruit talented employees to expand their businesses.
one_liner: Deverloper of talent and product hunt services platform intended to help startups grow and expand and also recruit talent. The company's platform operates as a matchmaking site for startups, talents, and investors, facilitating early-stage technology funding deals and early and later-stage funding to startups, enabling startups to access funds and investors and recruit talented employees to expand their businesses.
